wmndsBreadcrumbProps.name: items
wmndsBreadcrumbProps.description: Required. Array of breadcrumbs item objects. See items below.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. Text to use within the breadcrumbs item.

arrayOptions.name: href
arrayOptions.description: Link for the breadcrumbs item. If not specified, breadcrumb link will be automatically generated from the contentText strings from the items in the array.

arrayOptions.name: unlinkedItem
arrayOptions.description: If set to true, breadcrumbs item is a normal list item.

wmndsBreadcrumbProps.name: classes
wmndsBreadcrumbProps.description: Classes to add to the breadcrumbs container.

wmndsBreadcrumbProps.name: label
wmndsBreadcrumbProps.description: The accessibility label for the breadcrumb component. If not provided, this will default to 'Breadcrumbs'

wmndsBreadcrumbProps.name: isMobileApp
wmndsBreadcrumbProps.description: If true, breadcrumb will only show on devices with a screen resolution bigger than 768px
